title: How much does Chegg pay for biology questions? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Payment of Biology Expert totally Depends on the Badge alloted to them. The Distribution of Payment According to Badge is like this:- —₹87 for Bronze Badge —₹97 for Silver Badge —₹101 for Gold Badge —₹106 for Platinum Badge This Badge Alloted to the Experts Always depends upon the Number of Questions Expert has answered and the Quality (CF) of the Answers.  The Badge gets Renowned after a period of 7 days. Note:- The Above Table is only for Biology Expert. The Badge wise Payment of Other subject is different.
Currently Chegg India is paying 97 rupees per biology question solved.
